alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 5:24PM CDT until April 15 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR WESTERN DOUGLAS AND SOUTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN COUNTIES... At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Sparta, or 14 miles west of Ava, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ava... Goodhope... Garrison... Rome... Keltner... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
